title: Answering the Cries (3C37)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Discard a [Gondor] tale from hand to make a [Gondor] companion strength +2.
Lore:	“Drawing his bright sword and crying Elendil! Elendil! he crashed through the trees.”
Rarity:	C
